headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Marriott After Its Strong Multi Year Share Price Rally?
summary: If you are wondering whether Marriott International is still worth buying after its huge run over the last few years, you are not alone. This article is going to unpack exactly what you might be paying for today. The stock has climbed 6.1% over the last month and 14.3% year to date, adding to an impressive 117.6% gain over 3 years and 153.5% over 5 years. This naturally raises the question of how much upside might realistically be left. Recent moves have been driven by a steady stream of...
